values: 飞翔；飞行；飞行方向；班机；航班；逃跑；逃避；一系列（事物、活动或想法）；一段楼梯；（鸟类或昆虫的）飞群；（酒的）品鉴套装；（射箭的）箭羽；箭翼；镖尾
飞行；飞翔；逃跑；逃离；快速移动

word_group.brief_definition: 直飞航班；直达班机；直达航班
飞行控制；飞行指挥；操纵面
飞行模拟器；飞行练习（仿真）器
随航工程师；空勤机械师

bilingual.target: 飞行大约需要一个小时。

bilingual.source: The four pictures are of different flight inventions.
bilingual.target: 这四张图片展示了不同的飞行发明。

bilingual.source: For once you have tasted flight, you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards.
bilingual.target: 一旦你尝试过飞行，你会带着仰望天空的目光行走在地球上。
飞行模拟器模拟了真实的飞行条件。

bilingual.source: The aviator performs a pre-flight check before every flight.
bilingual.target: 飞行员在每次飞行前都会进行飞行前检查。
这只鸟的飞行非常迅速。

bilingual.source: I read a book during the flight.
bilingual.target: 我在飞行期间读了一本书。

bilingual.source: The flight attendant provides service to passengers during the flight.
bilingual.target: 空乘人员会在飞行过程中为乘客提供服务。

list.abstract: flight（[flaɪt]），英语单词，作名词为飞行；飞翔；飞行动物群。作动词为将（球）准确吊传；给（箭；镖）装羽毛；射击。短语搭配有domestic flight（国内班机）。例句为“From hill to hill no bird in flight.（千山鸟飞绝。）” flight相关近义词有fly、liner等。

yingyinNormal.en: The scan data from Snap's reconnaissance flight confirms Finn's report.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斯纳普的侦察飞行器传来的扫描数据证实了芬恩的报告。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, now that I've been completely insulted, have a good flight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 既然在这被羞辱了，就祝你们飞行愉快。

yingyinNormal.en: What is this? Oh, careful. That's my original series Battlestar Galactica flight suit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么？小心，那个是原版太空堡垒卡拉狄加的飞行服。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, why didn't you wear it on Halloween? Because it's not a costume, it's a flight suit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 万圣节的时候你怎么没穿这个？因为那不是制服，是件飞行服。

yingyinNormal.en: Hermes has 4 redundant flight computers, each connected to 3 redundant comm systems.
yingyinNormal.zh: 赫尔墨斯号有4个多余的飞行用电脑，每一个都连接着3个通讯系统。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. What's, that? That is an integrated ion trap and time-of-flight mass spectrometer. Wow. High-techie-techie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个又是什么？那是集成离子阱和飞行时间质谱仪。哇，高科技含量。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we have no record of an Odyssey... I can't tell you anything until I get the flight recorder from my ship.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们没有奥德赛号的记录... 在拿回飞船的飞行记录器前我什么都不会说。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her family are flying to another country for a holiday. We hope you have enjoyed your flight. Please fasten your seat belts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和她的家人去另一个国家旅行了。我们希望你能享受这趟飞行。请系上你的安全带。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her family are flying to another country for a holiday. We hope you have enjoyed your flight. Please fasten your seat belts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和她的家人去另一个国家旅行了。我们希望你能享受这趟飞行。请系上你的安全带。

yingyinNormal.en: And watching over the entire system, are the people in this state-of-the-art bunker in Northern Virginia, People like flight manager Debra Griffith.
yingyinNormal.zh: 整个系统就好像人们在南维吉尼亚的艺术碉堡中，比如飞行管理员黛布拉·格利菲恩。

yingyinNormal.en: Every computer simulation with the exact flight parameters demonstrated that a return to LaGuardia was possible. And not just possible, probable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每个计算机模拟都使用同样的飞行参数，证明返回拉瓜迪亚机场是可能的，而且不只是可能，是可行的。

yingyinNormal.en: Then a regional control center keeps tabs on it until it reaches 10,000 feet, where the flight enters one of the 21 en route centers across the country.
yingyinNormal.zh: 区域性的控制中心会负责监管，直到飞机飞行一万英尺为止，跨越国家到达21个中途指挥中心中的一个。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, which superpower physics lesson will you explore next? Shifting body size and content, super speed, flight, super strength, immortality, and invisibility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，你打算接着选择哪门超能力物理课去研究？是改变人体大小和成分,超级快的速度，飞行，神力，长生不老，还是隐身。

yingyinNormal.en: Your union has been advised. ACARS data relayed that the left engine continued to turn throughout the flight. Then the ACARS data is wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们的工会已被告知，飞机通信寻址与报告系统的传输数据显示，左翼发动机在整个飞行期间一直在转动。那飞机通信寻址与报告系统的数据错了。

yingyinNormal.en: Where's Paolo? Rome. Jerk missed his flight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 保罗在哪儿？罗马，那混蛋没赶上飞机。

yingyinNormal.en: You should go. You're gonna miss your flight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你该出发了，快错过航班了。

yingyinNormal.en: Jay, they delayed Sonia's flight until tomorrow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰，桑娅的航班延误到了明天。

yingyinNormal.en: Alright. When is the next flight out? About four hours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下一班飞机是几点？大约4小时后。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm in Sao Paolo now, about to get on a flight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我现在在圣保罗，准备上飞机。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe you can take a later flight. There is no later flight. Maybe you can go tomorrow. Tomorrow is not Thanksgiving!
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许你可以搭晚班飞机。没有了。你可以明天去。明天就不是感恩节了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a scheduled trip by plane between designated airports

examination_example.sentence: Have you noticed that you can leave on a <highlight>flight</highlight> an hour late but still arrive on time?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你有没有注意到你可以乘晚点一小时的班机离开，但仍然能准时到达?

examination_example.sentence: A one-hour <highlight>flight</highlight> is now billed as a two-hour <highlight>flight</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一小时的航班现在按两小时的航班计费。

examination_example.sentence: The crash of EgyptAir <highlight>Flight</highlight> 804, which terrorists may have downed over the Mediterranean Sea, provides another tragic reminder of why.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 埃及航空804号班机的坠毁，可能是被恐怖分子在地中海上击落的，它以悲剧的形式再次提醒我们为什么这么做。

sense_info_list.en: an extravagant or far-fetched idea or account; passing above and beyond ordinary bounds
the action or process of flying through the air
a journey made through the air or in space, especially a scheduled journey made by an airline

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a scheduled trip by plane between designated airports
the action or process of flying through the air

examination_example.sentence: The dream of personalised <highlight>flight</highlight> is still vivid in the minds of many inventors, some developing cycle-powered craft, others pouring money into jet packs (喷气飞行背包).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 个性化飞行的梦想在许多发明家的脑海中仍然历历在目，一些人正在开发循环动力飞行器，另一些人则在喷气飞行背包中投入大量资金。

sense_info_list.en: an extravagant or far-fetched idea or account; passing above and beyond ordinary bounds

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a scheduled trip by plane between designated airports

examination_example.sentence: Are you only looking for <highlight>flights</highlight> or a package holiday with everything included?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你是只找航班还是包价度假？

examination_example.sentence: Schools, restaurants, and businesses closed, and more than 1, 000 <highlight>flights</highlight> were canceled.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学校、餐馆和企业关闭，超过1000个航班被取消。

examination_example.sentence: So, to evaluate the risks of infection, the study team flew on 10 different <highlight>flights</highlight> in the U.S. during the flu season.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，为了评估感染的风险，研究小组在流感季节期间在美国乘坐了10个不同的航班。

sense_info_list.en: the action or process of flying through the air

examination_example.sentence: They use new types of guns, and birds could easily be shot down in <highlight>flight</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们使用新型枪支，飞行中的鸟很容易被击落。

sense_info_list.en: an extravagant or far-fetched idea or account; passing above and beyond ordinary bounds
a journey made through the air or in space; especially a scheduled journey made by an airline

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Ehlers returned to Minnesota, and then drove 100 miles to Minneapolis to put Rosie on a <highlight>flight</highlight> to Michigan.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 埃勒斯回到了明尼苏达州，然后开车100英里到明尼阿波利斯，把罗西送上了飞往密歇根的航班。

examination_example.sentence: He's still waiting for a <highlight>flight</highlight> out of New York.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他还在等从纽约起飞的航班。

examination_example.sentence: One morning, I had to book an immediate <highlight>flight</highlight> home for a family emergency.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一天早上，我不得不为家庭紧急情况预订一个立即回家的航班。

examination_example.sentence: He took a balloon <highlight>flight</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他乘热气球飞行。

examination_example.sentence: 50 honorable mention winners will each receive a T-shirt in memory of Earhart's final <highlight>flight</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为纪念埃尔哈特最后一次飞行，50名荣誉奖获得者每人将获得一件T恤。

examination_example.sentence: Terrafugia Inc. said Monday that its new flying car has completed its first <highlight>flight</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Terrafugia公司周一表示，其新型飞行汽车已经完成了首次飞行。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 直飞航班；直达班机；直达航班

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>flight</highlight> was delayed because of the bad weather.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为糟糕的天气，航班延误了。

examination_example.sentence: And when she traveled as a <highlight>flight</highlight> attendant, I did the same for her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当她作为空姐旅行时，我也为她做了同样的事。

examination_example.sentence: Bill, your <highlight>flight</highlight> leaves at 10 o'clock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比尔，你的航班10点起飞。

examination_example.sentence: It is reported that the First <highlight>Flight</highlight> Ceremony of Heze Mudan Airport was held on April 2nd, 2021.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据报道，菏泽牡丹机场于2021年4月2日举行首飞仪式。

examination_example.sentence: At <highlight>flight</highlight> school, Irving achieved his dream of learning how to fly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在飞行学校，Irving实现了他的梦想，学习如何飞行。

examination_example.sentence: In the end, he got enough money for <highlight>flight</highlight> school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，他筹到了足够的钱去上飞行学校。

examination_example.sentence: All this happens to increase blood flow and oxygen delivery throughout the body in a fight-or-<highlight>flight</highlight> reaction（对抗反应）.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有这些都会在“战或逃”反应中增加全身的血液流动和氧气输送。
